blogPost.excerpt: Mailmodo is an email marketing tool, powered by AMP Emails, enabling users to create & send app-like interactive emails to improve conversions. As interactions happen inside the email, users can take action seamlessly within the email.
blogPost.body: Mailmodo is an email marketing tool, powered by AMP Emails, enabling users to create & send app-like interactive emails to improve conversions. As interactions happen inside the email, users can take action seamlessly within the email.
blogPost.title: Mailmodo - Boost email conversions with interactive AMP emails.
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Mailmodo是一款电子邮件营销工具，由AMP Email提供支持，使用户能够创建和发送类似应用的交互式电子邮件，以提高转化率。由于互动发生在邮件内部，用户可以在邮件中无缝地采取行动。
localize.tagline: 利用交互式AMP电子邮件提高电子邮件的转化率。

localize.description: Mailmodo是一款電子郵件營銷工具，由AMP Email提供支持，使用戶能夠創建和發送類似應用的交互式電子郵件，以提高轉化率。由於互動發生在郵件內部，用戶可以在郵件中無縫地採取行動。
localize.tagline: 利用交互式AMP電子郵件提高電子郵件的轉化率。

previous.excerpt: Discover incredible music to use in your content for free, with automated clearance of copyright claims on YouTube. Uppbeat is the Spotify for creators!
previous.title: Uppbeat - Free music for creators, no copyright issues

localize.description: 发现难以置信的音乐，免费用于您的内容，并在YouTube上自动清除版权索赔。Uppbeat是创作者的Spotify!
localize.tagline: 为创作者提供免费音乐，没有版权问题

localize.description: 發現難以置信的音樂，免費用於您的內容，並在YouTube上自動清除版權索賠。Uppbeat是創作者的Spotify!
localize.tagline: 爲創作者提供免費音樂，沒有版權問題
